metadata.name: AddPSScriptAnalyzerSettings
metadata.title: AddPSScriptAnalyzerSettings
metadata.description: Add a PowerShell Script Analyzer settings file to the root of your workspace.
metadata.author: Plaster project

parameter.name: FileName
parameter.prompt: Enter the name of the Script Analyzer settings file

parameter.name: Editor
parameter.prompt: Select an editor for editor integration (or None):

choice.label: Visual Studio &Code
choice.help: Your editor is Visual Studio Code.

replace.substitute: `$1// Use a custom PowerShell Script Analyzer settings file for this workspace. // Relative paths for this setting are always relative to the workspace root dir. `"powershell.scriptAnalysis.settingsPath`": `"$PLASTER_PARAM_FileName`", `$1

content.message: $PLASTER_PARAM_FileName has been added to the folder '$PLASTER_DestinationPath'. Edit this file to configure your PSScriptAnalyzer settings.
The PowerShell extension for Visual Studio Code has been configured to use $PLASTER_PARAM_FileName via the settings.json file in '$PLASTER_DestinationPath\.vscode'.
